actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Jeffrey Parrack and Wanda Parrack.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of a claim against the United States arising out of negligent treatment received from personnel at a United States Navy facility. Directs the Secretary to pay a specified sum to the mother of such individual in compensation for the costs incurred by her in caring for her son.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Jeffrey Parrack and Wanda Parrack.
